description: A luxurious city in the Alabasta Kingdom known as the 'City of Dreams' due to its thriving casino and gambling industry. Despite the kingdom-wide drought, Rainbase prospered mysteriously, later revealed to be orchestrated by Crocodile who controlled the city's water supply. The city serves as the headquarters for Baroque Works.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Arrive at Rainbase
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates arrive in Rainbase after a day's journey through the desert, planning to confront Crocodile.
keyEvents.significance: The crew enters the city where Crocodile has his base of operations, marking the beginning of the direct confrontation.

keyEvents.title: Encounter with Smoker in Rainbase Bar
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Usopp accidentally encounter Smoker and Tashigi in a bar within Rainbase.
keyEvents.significance: This chance encounter ruins the crew's plan to stay hidden and creates additional complications.

keyEvents.title: Marine Chase Through Rainbase
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats are chased by Marines through the streets of Rainbase.
keyEvents.significance: Forces the crew to abandon their stealth approach and accelerates their timeline.

statusHistory.reason: City is thriving during the episode despite the kingdom-wide drought

description: A luxury casino, restaurant, and resort in Rainbase owned by Crocodile. The building features a distinctive pyramid design with a golden crocodile statue on top and blue-and-gold patterning. Below the main structure lies a basement several stories deep that serves as Crocodile's secret operational headquarters for Baroque Works.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Enter Rain Dinners
keyEvents.description: All the Straw Hat Pirates successfully converge on Rain Dinners and enter the casino while being pursued by Marines.
keyEvents.significance: The crew enters Crocodile's headquarters, walking into his trap and setting up the major confrontation.

keyEvents.title: Crocodile Prepares His Trap
keyEvents.description: Inside Rain Dinners, Crocodile and Miss All Sunday prepare to give the Straw Hats a 'warm welcome.'
keyEvents.significance: Reveals that the Straw Hats have walked into a carefully prepared trap.

statusHistory.reason: Operating as Crocodile's casino and secret headquarters

description: A bar located in Rainbase where Luffy and Usopp accidentally encountered Smoker and Tashigi, leading to a chaotic chase through the city.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Usopp Encounter Smoker
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Usopp loudly enter a bar and inadvertently sit right next to Smoker and Tashigi.
keyEvents.significance: This accidental encounter ruins the Straw Hats' plan to stay hidden in Rainbase.
